system.description:
The Wardens of the Wood are masters of using wooded areas as protection from threats. When fighting within a forest, they are treated as always having @UUID[Compendium.swade-core-rules.swade-rules.JournalEntry.swadecor03rules0.JournalEntryPage.03coverandobst00]{Light Cover}.

The Warden Initiate also adds the following to their list of available powers: @UUID[Compendium.swade-fantasy-companion.swade-fc-powers.Item.YRQtMHpu0GyC5iFY]{banish}, @UUID[Compendium.swade-fantasy-companion.swade-fc-powers.Item.0TRRYoKZecpUZMBv]{barrier}, @UUID[Compendium.swade-fantasy-companion.swade-fc-powers.Item.cvxABXzInlhAa7cA]{sanctuary}, @UUID[Compendium.swade-fantasy-companion.swade-fc-powers.Item.GMTgL2vLUZ0BTZ1w]{mind reading}, @UUID[Compendium.swade-fantasy-companion.swade-fc-powers.Item.pnhihi2oBjsjsh4N]{deflection}, @UUID[Compendium.swade-fantasy-companion.swade-fc-powers.Item.JT9KsqEAHjZzfCg5]{locate}.
